citeinfo.origin: Pennsylvania Department of Transportation, Bureau of Planning and Research, Cartographic Information Division
citeinfo.title: Boundaries of municipalities within Pennsylvania
citeinfo.othercit: Boundaries of municipalities within Pennsylvania as delineated for the PennDOT Type 10 general highway maps. Additional information comes from the Pennsylvania Bureau of Municipal Services. This layer contains all classifications of municipality including first and second class townships, boroughs, cities and the town.

procstep.procdesc: Merged the PA state municipalities. Checked topology.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
metainfo.metuc: The Appalachian Mountain Club (AMC) assumes no responsibility for errors, omissions, or any liability for damages resulting from use of any of the data. Any reliance placed on such information is strictly at the users own risk.
